original_title: The Love Boat XXX: A Parody
overview: Love Boat XXX promises something for everyone! Hot boiling sex, romance, and laughs! Just the like original, except the XXX part. Get reunited with your ship's crew as award winning parody director Will Ryder adds super hot sex to authentic costumes, sets, and disco music to make Love Boat XXX: A Parody into an unforgettable adult DVD experience
title: The Love Boat XXX: A Parody
